room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: Had a group of 5 people and we all had a blast! Was impressed with the number of different puzzles and even our one year old had a blast watching us have fun trying to figure it out. Definitely better way to spend time with family than a movie. Thank you for the great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: We had a group of 6 and it was difficult!! We made it with 5 minutes to spare!I would recommend this to anyone who loves a challenge! Only 15% make it through in the allotted time!!! WOW!!!

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: We had a blast! There were three of us and that hour went by FAST! We were there for something different and to celebrate Vet Day.. what a different experience. Took us a few minutes to get the first clue down but we got the hang of it and made it with out a second to spare! ha Highly recommended it!! Super fun time.

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: I got to do this while I was in town visiting my youngest brother and absolutely loved it!! We did it with a group of five which was just enough for us to divide and conquer the puzzles without stepping all over each other. Everything was very well put together and a ton of fun to do. I highly recommend this!!

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: I saw this place on the City of Redmond's Facebook page and knew immediately I had to try it. Booked it for my husband's birthday as a surprise. Thankfully we brought friends with us, we needed the additional brain power. Had an amazing time! I highly recommend trying it. We'll be back to try their newest adventure and see if we can beat our escape time.

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: Had so much fun with the whole family. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: Is there any chance you have an estimate on when the next room might be up and running? No pressure or anything, we want it to be just right too, we're just really excited about it!

room_title: Escape room "Mona Lisa Heist" by Conundroom in Seattle
review: Sooo much fun!! Can't wait to see our pic from our escape!!!
